the pattern reaches 20 from the cast-on edge knit 8 row 4 ridges of garter stitch on the next right side row complete 5 button holes as follows knit 4 stitches place first button hole knit to one stitch before the first raised decrease knit another button hole and so on your final button hole should be 4 stitches from the edge to make button hole yarn forward slip one yarn back slip one bind off one yarn forward slip one yarn back bind off one slip the last stitch back to the left needle cable cast-on four stitches to the left needle slip the last cast-on stitch to the right needle bind off one yarn forward slip one yarn back slip one yarn forward slip one yarn back knit on another 5-7 stitches and knit another until you have 5 button holes knit another 10 row 5 garter ridges finishing loosely bind-off all stitches and weave in ends soak cowl in warm water with wool wash for about 20 minutes drain out water roll in a towel and then lay flat and shape to dry you need not stretch or pin out the cowl it will be plenty long approximately 22 copyright © melissa tuttle sibley 2015 this pattern and items knitted from it are for personal use only and may not be copied
